I hope you can help me with this. Iâ€™ve created a custom channel and successfully send messages from our external service (our dashboard) to this custom channel. To group messages, I use the `integrationThreadId`, which works as expected.

However, I want to ensure that if a user starts a conversation through another channel (e.g., by sending a support request via email), they can continue the same thread within our dashboard (the external service).

Is there a way to achieve this?

Based on doc -

<https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/guides/api/conversations/create-custom-channels#specifying-a-threading-model>

I think you have to set your threadingModel to DELIVERY_IDENTIFIER_BASED_THREADING to combine all channels into single thread based on contracts.
disclaimer: I am not an HubSpot employee, but developing extensively on HubSpot and custom channels, so trying to help based on what I know
